metadata.author: Google
metadata.comments: Solution template for Google Threat Intelligence

metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

properties.description: This connector provides access to various Google Threat Intelligence API endpoints for retrieving file, IP, domain, and URL analysis reports.

info.title: Google Threat Intelligence
info.description: This connector provides access to various Google Threat Intelligence API endpoints for retrieving file, IP, domain, and URL analysis reports.

get.description: Retrieve detailed analysis report for a specific file by its ID.

id.description: The unique identifier (SHA-256 hash) of the file.

type.description: The type of object being analyzed (in this case, "file").

self.description: The URL to retrieve this file's report.

times_submitted.description: The number of times this file has been submitted to Google Threat Intelligence.

meaningful_name.description: A human-readable name for the file (if available).

sha1.description: The SHA-1 hash of the file.

magic.description: A textual description of the file type, as determined by libmagic.

harmless.description: The number of votes classifying this file as harmless.
harmless.title: total votes harmless

malicious.description: The number of votes classifying this file as malicious.
malicious.title: total votes malicious

type_tag.description: A high-level categorization of the file type (e.g., "PE executable", "PDF document").

malicious.description: The number of antivirus engines that detected the file as malicious in the latest analysis.
malicious.title: last analysis malicious

suspicious.description: The number of antivirus engines that detected the file as suspicious in the latest analysis.
suspicious.title: last analysis suspicious

undetected.description: The number of antivirus engines that did not detect any threats in the file in the latest analysis.
undetected.title: last analysis undetected

harmless.description: The number of antivirus engines that explicitly classified the file as harmless in the latest analysis.
harmless.title: last analysis harmless

timeout.description: The number of antivirus engines that timed out during the latest analysis.
timeout.title: last analysis timeout

confirmed-timeout.description: The number of antivirus engines that experienced a confirmed timeout during the latest analysis.
confirmed-timeout.title: last analysis confirmed-timeout

failure.description: The number of antivirus engines that encountered an error during the latest analysis.
failure.title: last analysis failure

type-unsupported.description: The number of antivirus engines that do not support the analysis of this file type.
type-unsupported.title: last analysis type-unsupported

ssdeep.description: The ssdeep fuzzy hash of the file, used for similarity comparison.

type_description.description: A more detailed description of the file type (e.g., "Microsoft Word Document").

tlsh.description: The TLSH fuzzy hash of the file, used for similarity comparison.

reputation.description: The reputation score of the file, calculated based on various factors.

sha256.description: The SHA-256 hash of the file.

unique_sources.description: The number of unique sources from which this file has been submitted.

names.description: A list of names associated with the file.

tags.description: Tags associated with the file, providing additional context or categorization.

last_submission_date.description: The Unix timestamp of the last time this file was submitted to Google Threat Intelligence.

last_modification_date.description: The Unix timestamp of the last modification date of the file (if available).

size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

md5.description: The MD5 hash of the file.

value.description: The severity level assigned by Google Threat Intelligence's GTI (e.g., "SEVERITY_NONE", "SEVERITY_LOW", etc.).
value.title: severity

severity.description: The severity assessment of the file.

value.description: The threat score assigned by Google Threat Intelligence's GTI, indicating the likelihood of the file being malicious.
value.title: threat score

threat_score.description: The threat score assessment of the file.

value.description: The overall verdict of the file's analysis by Google Threat Intelligence's GTI (e.g., "VERDICT_UNDETECTED", "VERDICT_MALICIOUS", etc.).
value.title: verdict

verdict.description: The overall verdict of the file's analysis.

description.description: A textual description of the GTI assessment.

gti_assessment.description: GTI's (Google Threat Intelligence) assessment of the file.

attributes.description: Attributes and metadata associated with the file.

get.description: Retrieve analysis and reputation information about a specific IP address.

id.description: The unique identifier for this IP address report.

self.description: The URL to retrieve this IP address report.

asn.description: The Autonomous System Number (ASN) associated with the IP address.

network.description: The network or CIDR block the IP address belongs to.

last_https_certificate_date.description: The date of the last HTTPS certificate seen for this IP address (Unix timestamp).

country.description: The country associated with the IP address.

as_owner.description: The name of the organization that owns the ASN associated with the IP address.

reputation.description: The reputation score of the IP address (-100 to 100).

harmless.description: The number of votes classifying the IP address as harmless.
harmless.title: total votes harmless

malicious.description: The number of votes classifying the IP address as malicious.
malicious.title: total votes malicious

total_votes.description: The breakdown of votes on the IP address's maliciousness.

whois.description: The raw WHOIS data for the IP address.

tags.description: Tags associated with the IP address based on community analysis.

malicious.description: The number of engines that detected the IP address as malicious.
malicious.title: last analysis malicious

suspicious.description: The number of engines that detected the IP address as suspicious.
suspicious.title: last analysis suspicious

undetected.description: The number of engines that did not detect the IP address as malicious or suspicious.
undetected.title: last analysis undetected

harmless.description: The number of engines that detected the IP address as harmless.
harmless.title: last analysis harmless

timeout.description: The number of engines that timed out during the analysis of the IP address.
timeout.title: last analysis timeout

last_analysis_stats.description: Statistics from the last analysis of the IP address.

whois_date.description: The date the WHOIS data was last updated.

regional_internet_registry.description: The Regional Internet Registry (RIR) responsible for the IP address.

last_modification_date.description: The date the IP address report was last modified.

continent.description: The continent where the IP address is located.

value.description: The severity level assigned by GTI.
value.title: severity

severity.description: The severity level assigned by GTI.

value.description: The threat score assigned by GTI (0-100).
value.title: threat score

threat_score.description: The threat score assigned by GTI (0-100).

mandiant_confidence_score.description: The confidence score assigned by Mandiant (0-100).

normalised_categories.description: Normalized categories associated with the IP address.

pervasive_indicator.description: Indicates if the IP address is a pervasive indicator.

safebrowsing_verdict.description: The verdict from Google Safe Browsing.

contributing_factors.description: Factors contributing to the GTI assessment.

description.description: A description of the GTI assessment.

gti_assessment.description: Google Threat Intelligence (GTI) assessment of the IP address.

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: Ip address to obtain the report

get.description: Retrieve analysis and reputation information about a specific domain.

self.description: The url to retrieve this domain report.

harmless.description: The count of votes indicating the domain is safe.
harmless.title: total votes harmless

malicious.description: The count of votes suggesting the domain is harmful.
malicious.title: total votes malicious

total_votes.description: his object provides a summary of community votes regarding the domain's potential maliciousness.

reputation.description: A numerical score ranging from -100 to 100, reflecting the domain's overall reputation based on various factors.

whois.description: The raw WHOIS data associated with the domain, containing registration details and contact information.

last_https_certificate_date.description: The Unix timestamp indicating when the last HTTPS certificate for this domain was observed.

last_dns_records_date.description: The Unix timestamp representing the last time DNS records were fetched for this domain.

registrar.description: The entity responsible for registering the domain name.

last_modification_date.description: The Unix timestamp showing when the domain report was last updated.

creation_date.description: The Unix timestamp marking the domain's initial registration date.

tags.description: An array of tags assigned to the domain based on community analysis and observations.

last_update_date.description: The Unix timestamp indicating the most recent update to the domain's information.

malicious.description: The number of analysis engines flagging the domain as malicious.
malicious.title: last analysis malicious

suspicious.description: The count of engines raising suspicion about the domain.
suspicious.title: last analysis suspicious

undetected.description: The number of engines that didn't detect any malicious or suspicious activity.
undetected.title: last analysis undetected

harmless.description: The count of engines explicitly classifying the domain as safe.
harmless.title: last analysis harmless

timeout.description: The number of engines that timed out during the analysis.
timeout.title: last analysis timeout

last_analysis_stats.description: Statistics derived from the latest analysis of the domain.

value.description: The severity level assigned by GTI.
value.title: severity

severity.description: The severity level assigned by GTI.

value.description: The threat score assigned by GTI (0-100).
value.title: threat score

threat_score.description: The threat score assigned by GTI (0-100).

mandiant_confidence_score.description: The confidence score assigned by Mandiant (0-100).

normalised_categories.description: Normalized categories associated with the IP address.

pervasive_indicator.description: Indicates if the IP address is a pervasive indicator.

safebrowsing_verdict.description: The verdict from Google Safe Browsing.

contributing_factors.description: Factors contributing to the GTI assessment.

description.description: A description of the GTI assessment.

gti_assessment.description: Google Threat Intelligence (GTI) assessment of the IP address.

get.description: Retrieve analysis and reputation information about a specific URL.

type.description: The type of object being analyzed

self.description: Url to retrieve this url report

last_final_url.description: The final URL after any redirects.

harmless.description: Number of votes indicating the URL is safe.
harmless.title: total votes harmless

malicious.description: Number of votes indicating the URL is harmful.
malicious.title: total votes malicious

total_votes.description: The breakdown of votes from the Google Threat Intelligence community on whether the URL is considered harmless or malicious.

tags.description: Community-assigned tags providing additional context or categorization for the URL.

times_submitted.description: The total number of times this URL has been submitted to Google Threat Intelligence for analysis.

last_modification_date.description: The date (in Unix timestamp format) when the URL report was last modified.

reputation.description: A score ranging from -100 to 100, representing the URL's reputation based on various factors and community assessments.

last_analysis_date.description: The date (in Unix timestamp format) when the last analysis of the URL was performed.

malicious.description: The number of engines that detected the URL as malicious.
malicious.title: last analysis malicious

suspicious.description: The number of engines that flagged the URL as suspicious.
suspicious.title: last analysis suspicious

undetected.description: The number of engines that did not detect any threats in the URL.
undetected.title: last analysis undetected

harmless.description: The number of engines that explicitly classified the URL as harmless.
harmless.title: last analysis harmless

timeout.description: The number of engines that timed out during the analysis.
timeout.title: last analysis timeout

last_analysis_stats.description: A summary of the results from the most recent analysis of the URL by different antivirus engines.

last_submission_date.description: he date (in Unix timestamp format) when the URL was last submitted for analysis.

url.description: The actual URL that was analyzed.

first_submission_date.description: The date (in Unix timestamp format) of the very first time this URL was submitted to Google Threat Intelligence.

title.description: The title or webpage name extracted from the URL

value.description: The severity level assigned by GTI.
value.title: severity

severity.description: The severity level assigned by GTI.

value.description: The threat score assigned by GTI (0-100).
value.title: threat score

threat_score.description: The threat score assigned by GTI (0-100).

mandiant_confidence_score.description: The confidence score assigned by Mandiant (0-100).

normalised_categories.description: Normalized categories associated with the IP address.

pervasive_indicator.description: Indicates if the IP address is a pervasive indicator.

safebrowsing_verdict.description: The verdict from Google Safe Browsing.

contributing_factors.description: Factors contributing to the GTI assessment.

description.description: A description of the GTI assessment.

gti_assessment.description: Google Threat Intelligence (GTI) assessment of the IP address.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: URL id to obtain the report

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The file to upload for analysis

get.summary: Retrieve information about a file or URL analysis
get.description: Get the status and results of a file or URL analysis.

id.description: The unique identifier for this analysis request.

type.description: Indicates the type of analysis performed, either "file" or "url".

self.description: The URL to retrieve the analysis information itself.

item.description: The URL to access the analyzed file or URL.

links.description: Provides URLs related to the analysis.

malicious.description: The number of engines that flagged the item as malicious.

suspicious.description: The number of engines that flagged the item as malicious.

undetected.description: The number of engines that didn't detect any threats.

harmless.description: The number of engines that explicitly classified the item as harmless.

timeout.description: The number of engines that timed out during the analysis.

confirmed-timeout.description: The number of engines that experienced a confirmed timeout.

failure.description: The number of engines that encountered an error during analysis.

type-unsupported.description: The number of engines that don't support analyzing this type of item.

stats.description: Summarizes the detection results from various antivirus engines.

date.description: The date (in Unix timestamp format) when the analysis was completed.

status.description: The current status of the analysis.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Analysis id to obtain the report

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: Please refer to the following before installing the solution:

• Review the solution Release Notes

• There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

This Google Threat Intelligence Solution contains Playbooks that can help enrich incident information with threat information and intelligence for IPs, file hashes and URLs from Google Threat Intelligence. Enriched information can help drive focused investigations in Security Operations.

Custom Azure Logic Apps Connectors: 1,

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
